content:
Dear [Client],

Thank you for considering me for your social media marketing needs for both of your businesses. I have put together a proposal outlining the services I can provide and their corresponding pricing.

Here are the packages that I am offering:

1. Content provided by you
2. Thumbnail
3. Caption
4. Hashtags
5. Scheduling

This package is priced at $150 for each business, which includes services for TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn. These services will help your businesses establish a strong social media presence, increase engagement with your audience, and generate more leads and sales.

In addition to the base package, I am also offering the following add-ons:

1. Social Media Automation for Messenger, Instagram, SMS, Emails, WhatsApp
2. Designing of regular social media posts
3. Copywriting

These add-ons are also available for TikTok, Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn. Social media automation will help you save time and effort in managing your social media accounts, while regular post designing will ensure that your social media profiles stay visually appealing and engaging. Copywriting services will help you create compelling and persuasive social media content that resonates with your target audience and drives more conversions.

The total cost for the base package with add-ons is $239.5 for each business. Please note that this pricing does not include any applicable transaction fees, US tax, and other charges.

If you choose to purchase all services offered for both businesses, the total cost would be $283/month for each business. These services will provide a comprehensive social media marketing strategy that will help your businesses stand out from the competition, increase brand awareness, and drive more sales and revenue.

I believe these packages offer the right combination of services to meet your social media marketing needs. If you have any questions or would like to discuss this proposal further, please don't hesitate to contact me.

Thank you for considering my proposal, and I look forward to the opportunity to work with you.

Best regards,

[Your name]
